channel.title: Dynamics Gp 12 on 0x000216
channel.description: Recent content in Dynamics Gp 12 on 0x000216

item.title: Exciting Features of Dynamics GP 12 Web Client
item.description: There was significant discussion at GPPC regarding the new web client for Dynamics GP 12, prompting me to consider its integration into deployment strategies and its potential benefits for customers and prospects. While some specifically request it, I’m interested in understanding the practical applications of the web client. Although I’m not an expert on the web client’s architecture, I can appreciate the complex efforts behind it. Here are my key takeaways from sessions in Las Vegas:

item.title: Partner Connections Conference GP12 Update
item.description: My recent trip to Las Vegas for the GPPC Partner Connections conference was a whirlwind! While Vegas can be exhausting, the conference was incredibly informative. I learned a great deal and connected with other professionals. I even led a few sessions on Sure Step. The highlights were definitely the sessions covering exciting new developments like GP12, the new web client, demo tools, and the impressive SQL report builder. One of the most talked-about topics was the upcoming enhancements in GP12.
